column4: How do I unlock the www folder so I can move a folder into it?
I'm guessing you'd have to check the ownership of the www folder
I have tried chmod 777 www but that does not work
you can change ownership with chown <user>:<group> www
and I guess you're currently root?
I am not sure how to check that. chown--- Operation not permitted
type whoami - it will tell you the user you're currently logged in as
sounds like you don't have permission to modify the folder..although if you couldn't chown you shouldn't of been able to chmod..I think
I am not root at the moment.
ok, to change the owner you'd have to be root..but I agree, 777 should of done the trick
I do not know how to change myself to root.
if you're logged in as a user that can su, you can type 'sudo su', and provide your current accounts password
sudo did the trick. Me so happy, thanks!
